iis:bindings_test.comment: Ensure host headers are on all sites

iis:applicationpool_test.comment: Ensure 'application_count' is 'less than or equal' to '1'

iis:systemweb_test.comment: Ensure 'forms_credential_format' is 'case insensitive not equal' to 'Clear'
Ensure 'forms_credential_format' is 'case insensitive not equal' to 'Clear'
Ensure 'custom_errors' is 'case insensitive not equal' to 'Off'

iis:webconfig_test.comment: Ensure 'request_limits_max_url' is 'less than or equal' to '4096'
Ensure 'request_limits_max_query' is 'less than or equal' to '2048'
